BasicMetadata.description: The metadata section for the "basic" digital object.

created_by.description: An entity responsible for making the resource.
created_by.title: creator

creation_date.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was created or the  item was added to a DataFeed.
creation_date.title: created date

derived_from.description: A derivation is a transformation of an entity into another, an  update of an entity resulting in a new one, or the construction  of a new entity based on a pre-existing entity.
derived_from.title: was derived from

license.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something  with the resource.
license.title: license

publisher.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available.
publisher.title: publisher

see_also.description: A reference used to indicate a resource that might  provide additional information about the subject resource.
see_also.title: see also

title.description: A name given to the resource.
title.title: title

version.description: The version of the CreativeWork embodied by a specified  resource.
version.title: version

BasicMetadata.title: Basic Metadata

citation.description: A citation or reference to another creative work, such  as another publication, web page, scholarly article, etc.
citation.title: citation

citationOverall.description: A written reference to a source, such as a  book, article, or website, that identifies  the original source of information in a work.
citationOverall.title: citation

creation_date.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was created or the  item was added to a DataFeed.
creation_date.title: created date

creators.description: An entity responsible for making the resource.
creators.title: creator

distributions.description: An available distribution of the dataset.
distributions.title: dataset distribution

doi.description: A DOI, or Digital Object Identifier, is a  unique string of numbers, letters, and symbols  that identifies a specific publication.
doi.title: DOI

externalReviewers.description: An independent expert from outside an organization  who provides critical feedback and evaluation on  a program, project, or proposal.
externalReviewers.title: external reviewer

funders.description: A Grant that directly or indirectly provide  funding or sponsorship for this item.
funders.title: funding

id.description: A unique identifier for the entity
id.title: concept identifier

label.description: A human-readable label or name associated with the entity.
label.title: concept label

license.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something  with the resource.
license.title: license

project_leads.description: A person who is responsible for leading a project  or a specific aspect of a project, including planning, implementation, and tracking.
project_leads.title: project lead

publisher.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available.
publisher.title: publisher

reviewers.description: People or organizations that have reviewed the  content on this web page for accuracy and/or  completeness.
reviewers.title: reviewer

see_also.description: A reference used to indicate a resource that might  provide additional information about the subject resource.
see_also.title: see also

title.description: A name given to the resource.
title.title: title

version.description: The version of the CreativeWork embodied by a specified  resource.
version.title: version

was_derived_from.description: A derivation is a transformation of an entity into another, an  update of an entity resulting in a new one, or the construction  of a new entity based on a pre-existing entity.
was_derived_from.title: was derived from

accessUrl.description: A URL of the resource that gives access to a distribution of the dataset. E.g. landing page, feed, SPARQL endpoint.
accessUrl.title: access URL

downloadUrl.description: The URL of the downloadable file in a given format.
downloadUrl.title: download URL

id.description: A unique identifier for the entity
id.title: concept identifier

label.description: A human-readable label or name associated with the entity.
label.title: concept label

mediaType.description: The media type of the distribution as defined by IANA.
mediaType.title: media type

title.description: A name given to the resource.
title.title: title

awardNumber.description: An award won by or for this item.
awardNumber.title: award

funder.description: A person or organization that supports (sponsors)  something through some kind of financial contribution.
funder.title: funder

conforms_to.description: Indicates the type or specification that the entity adheres to.
conforms_to.title: conforms to

firstName.description: Given name. In the U.S., the first name of a person.
firstName.title: first name

fullName.description: The full name of a person.
fullName.title: full name

label.title: concept label

lastName.description: Family name. In the U.S., the last name of a person.
lastName.title: last name

type_of.description: Defines the class type that this instance belongs to.
type_of.title: type of

label.description: A human-readable label or name associated with the entity.

target_product.description: Target Operating System / Product to which  the code applies. If applies to several versions,  just the product name can be used.
target_product.title: target product

type_of.description: Defines the class type that this instance belongs to.
type_of.title: type of

version.title: version

code_repository.description: Link to the repository where the un-compiled,  human readable code and related code is located  (SVN, GitHub, CodePlex).
code_repository.title: code repository
